channelSourceRequestsPendingEmpty.headline: You didn't receive any sender yet
channelSourceRequestsPendingEmpty.message: You haven't received any requests from your client yet

channelSourceRequestsCompletedEmpty.headline: You don't have sender yet with complete status
channelSourceRequestsCompletedEmpty.message: Check the request you have received on pending list to complete them

channelSourceOptOutListViewEmpty.firstLabelHint: You can click on the import section.
channelSourceOptOutListViewEmpty.secondLabelHint: You can create new contacts or import your own list of contacts to start sending you campaigns.
channelSourceOptOutListViewEmpty.headline: You don't have any opt-out list yet

channelSourceRequestApprove.title: Approve Request
channelSourceRequestApprove.message: Are you sure you want to approve the sender {{name}} request for the target country {{country}}?

REJECT.title: Reject Request
REJECT.message: Are you sure you want to reject the sender {{sender}} request for the target country {{country}}?

BLOCK.title: Reject & Block Request
BLOCK.message: Are you sure you want to reject & Block the sender {{sender}} request for the target country {{country}}?

channelSourceListingBlock.title: Block Sender Listing
channelSourceListingBlock.message: Are you sure you wish to block this sender for {{company}} towards {{country}}? The client will be unable to send messages through this sender to the chosen country and it will appear as Blocked at the clients list end.

channelSourceListingSuspend.title: Suspend Sender
channelSourceListingSuspend.message: Are you sure you wish to Suspend this sender for {{country}}? The client using it will be unable to send messages through this sender to the chosen country.

channelSourceListingActivate.title: Activate Sender
channelSourceListingActivate.message: Are you sure you wish to approve this sender for {{country}}? The company with access will be able to send messages through this sender to the chosen country.

smsOptInSender.title: Opt-in Phone Number
smsOptInSender.message: Are you sure you want to opt-in this phone number?

importChannelSourceOptOut.title: Import
importChannelSourceOptOut.label: Import file
importChannelSourceOptOut.tooltip: Make sure the file includes only one column in valid phone number format
importChannelSourceOptOut.validationMessage: Size less than 50 MB for CSV, and 30 MB for XLX

errors.file-too-large: File is too large, and exceeds the limit: 50MB for csv / 30MB for excel
errors.file-invalid-type: Invalid file upload. Your uploaded file should be of type: csv or excel.

CHANNEL_SOURCE_REQUEST.message: Are you sure you want to add this Sender request?

deleteChannelSource.successToast: Sender successfully deleted from the list.
